name: Identità EU
goal: The Association has the goal to support and promote the relations of its members, the inclusion of citizens, in order to gain political and organizational strength in the Italian and European arena. It wants support the participation of minority youths and people living in Europe. Identità EU wants contribute to the realization of the purpose of the EPP and its members participating in the initiatives of YEPP and EPP and encouraging and organizing activities at Italian and European level to promote youth and citizens participation within and towards political parties, platforms and coordination structures. It wants also develop a general political debate, develop clear political strategies and take own initiatives promoting the ideas of the association and contributing to a better knowledge of the process of co-operation and integration in Europe and to support and promote basic European values and democracy building.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Identità EU follow all the parlamentary activities at national and European level, presenting reports and resolutions in the varius platforms in which partecipate.
For example it has presented a resolution about "the European citizenship" o "the persecution of Christians in Europe". Many others fields are esaminated as the web law sistem and the civil education in the schools.
